text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra where concept is-a MIF-ConceptRelationshipTransitivity

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    MIF-ConceptRelationshipTransitivityGrouper code for MIF SupportedConceptRelationship.transitivity codes

name: MIFConceptRelationshipTransitivity
title: MIF Concept Relationship Transitivity
description: Codes for use in the ext-mif-relationship-transitivity to capture V3 Model Interchange Format (MIF) SupportedConceptRelationship.transitivity values
